launcher.name: RetroArch Game and Watch (Game and Watch)
RetroArch Neko Project II Kai (NEC PC-98)
RetroArch Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup (Standalone Game)
RetroArch Launch App Only
launcher.command: am start --user 0 -a android.intent.action.MAIN -c android.intent.category.LAUNCHER -e CONFIGFILE %CFG_PATH% -e IME com.android.inputmethod.latin/.LatinIME -n com.retroarch/com.retroarch.browser.retroactivity.RetroActivityFuture --activity-clear-task --activity-clear-top --activity-no-history
